item.title: Applying the Formula One Formula | Jurriaan Kamer (Speaker | Author | Organization designer | Change agent )
item.itunes:title: Applying the Formula One Formula | Jurriaan Kamer (Speaker | Author | Organization designer | Change agent )
item.itunes:subtitle: What we can learn from the masters of motorsport
item.description:
Applying the Formula One Formula — What we can learn from the masters of motorsport Jurriaan Kamer (Speaker | Author | Organization designer | Change agent ) The tension between organizations optimized for predictability and the unpredictable world they inhabit has reached a breaking point. Organizations built on ‘sense and respond’ instead of ‘plan and predict’ are the future.


Meet Jurriaan https://www.jurriaankamer.com/


Visit our website for more information on Sytems Thinking http://vuuma.com/


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za
item.content:encoded:
Applying the Formula One Formula — What we can learn from the masters of motorsport Jurriaan Kamer (Speaker | Author | Organization designer | Change agent ) The tension between organizations optimized for predictability and the unpredictable world they inhabit has reached a breaking point. Organizations built on ‘sense and respond’ instead of ‘plan and predict’ are the future.


Meet Jurriaan https://www.jurriaankamer.com/
